name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Ask Haiku Reader to tell me another poem”
”Tell Haiku Reader to give me a poem”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Start with "Alexa, open Haiku Reader" to have Alexa recite some interesting haikus. 

Try saying:
"Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem."
"Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to recite a poem."
"Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to share a poem."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
